website_summaries.verdict: If you want to get as close to a "real game" feel as possible, this is the overall best choice.
pros: Large glass backboard is mounted well in front of the supporting pole, creating space under the breakaway rim
Clever anchor system makes it easy to reinstall
cons: It's not quite a "pro" basketball hoop, but it's getting pretty close

customer_reviews.title: Goal is great. Amazon install is AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: This goal works great, very little shake. Purchased from Amazon b/c of the free install. Ended up having to jackhammer and scoop out 960lbs of concrete because Amazon install person didn't mix the concrete and still hadn't set in the middle after 3 weeks. Happiness guarantee from the Amazon installer side was terrible to work with. Won't take calls, only emails and takes days-weeks to get back to you. Hire a contractor you get to interview. Don't use amazon.
customer_reviews.author: KC4ME

customer_reviews.title: Buy the BEST if your expect the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: When we moved into our new home, our son's only request was a new basketball goal. After shopping around and debating whether the extra money to by a Goalrilla Goal was worth it, we are SO HAPPY we made the investment. We purchased the goal in the summer, but we didn't want to write a review until it had been tested by our son and his friends. Well, 6 months of rim-grabbing, slam-dunking, three-on-threes later, our goal looks as good as when we first installed it. Living in Indiana, we take our basketball seriously, and we couldn't be happier with our Goalrilla Goal.
customer_reviews.author: teachforthestars

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have not had this for very long yet, but am very happy with the purchase. It is pretty rock solid and looks great. Adjusting the height is not a big deal, but can be a pain if you need to do it frequently. This is a lot of fun for the entire family and I can see us using this for many years. It is worth the money to have someone else install it unless you have prior experience and some extra help. It is definitely a 2-3 person job and not something you want to mess up.
customer_reviews.author: Coal cracker

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty quality and install
customer_reviews.text: The goal is heavy duty and a pleasure to use. The quality comes through in its use, though that quality does come at some installation complexity. It is not hard to put together, just heavy. I suggest having one more set of hands that you think you will need. The anchoring systems is a great design, simplified the leveling process, and will make it possible to move the goal in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Couch

customer_reviews.title: Very solid
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews, I decided to spend a little extra money to get this goal. I am very glad I did. I had it professionally installed and it is rock solid. It does not shake at all. It's very easy to adjust the height. I would highly recommend this hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Our Family
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 60” hoop not only for our kids, (5 and 7) but also for us, the parents, for something to do outside. It has been perfect. The ability to raise and lower the rim keeps the whole family entertained and interested. After we found a couple friends who had installed hoops before to help with installation it was smooth sailing for us. I love the in ground anchor system - it is secure and gives us the ability to easily move hoop to another house if we need to. The hoop looks good in the driveway and is sleek enough not to draw any unnecessary attention to it. Our kids love it—it’s a win for us!
customer_reviews.author: KelW

customer_reviews.title: Great goal!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Kids love it. Installation through Amazon went smoothly. Very durable!
customer_reviews.author: RXDOG

customer_reviews.title: Must Read If Building An Actual Court!!!
customer_reviews.text: Solid product if you're looking for a hoop to set up in your driveway. Please note that the specs for the overhang are NOT accurate!!! If you are building a court and the measurements need to be exact, please be aware that the overhang is not as advertised! It's 38 inches at regulation height of 10ft and not the 4ft overhang as listed! Contacted the manufacturers about this and their response was that the overhang is four feet when the arms are completely horizontal...yeah....because most people apparently play on a 7ft hoop. Despite the misleading advertising, the hoop itself is of high quality and quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Mary Cayea

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend to anyone in the market for a basketball goal.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I’m very impressed with the quality of parts, the hardware and how everything is laid out for you. Everything is heavy so make sure you take the advise of the instructions and get additional help💪💪.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop if you have the right parts.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the FT series and received a mixture of parts for the FT and CV model. Board doesn’t fit in the arm properly. Have to add several washers so the board fits in the arm and doesn’t wiggle. The arm is the CV model. Assuming the board is the FT. Bolts weren’t labeled and didn’t match the model we ordered. Washers missing. Pretty much a nightmare to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Johansen

customer_reviews.title: Rusting
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy but various large poles (specifically the upper pole) started rusting down the sides two months after installation. The manufacturer honors the warranty, but you still need to pay someone to dissemble the system to replace the rusted piece.
customer_reviews.author: ACM

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this basketball hoop exceeds expectations. Easy to follow instructions. Everything went where it was supposed to how it was suppose to. Quality finish. Looks spiffy. Buy one. Your kids will thank you and you'll always know where they are.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra King

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: If you’re serious about getting a top of the line goal, this is it. We researched for a while and all reviews pointed to this brand and they were right. Just go with that bigger post for no rattle or movement. Install went smooth as well from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Copass

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This hoop is awesome. The kids love it and have used it for hours already. So well made, so strong and built to last. The installation was great as well - I highly recommend having it done through Amazon, makes life so much easier. This gets an A+ for sure!
customer_reviews.author: J Frank

customer_reviews.title: Amazon did not honor their Assembly
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, other than needing 5-6 strong humans to assemble it. I had ordered with Assembly from Amazon, but then they backed out and want me to pay for return. Ended up costing me nearly $500
customer_reviews.author: JPD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Had it installed- it’s amazing. Holds up great- you can hang on the rim with a dunk- doesn’t move - very sturdy professional grade.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Driveway ballin
customer_reviews.text: The hoop was quite easy to install and I’m not the most handy. I dug the hole and poured the concrete. Easy assembly and installation but does require minimum of three people to put it all together. Overall very satisfied with this basketball hoop!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I love the durability of this hoop. Very sturdy, very tough. And it looks good, too!
customer_reviews.author: Brian J Cockrell

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy goal. Great natural bounce off the rim and backboard. The only thing I regret is not buying the 72in. I grew up playing on a portable goal and I would never buy another one of those again after shooting on this goal.
customer_reviews.author: James Beeler

customer_reviews.title: Best hoop!
customer_reviews.text: My son, family and friends LOVE this hoop. Easy to install but definitely need a few people.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ann Fera

customer_reviews.title: Poor delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Lousey delivery. Looked like it was dumped off the back of the truck. Box broken open.
customer_reviews.author: Lenard A Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome basketball hoop!
customer_reviews.text: The hoop is exactly what we hoped for - very sturdy and well constructed, and the backboard is thick glass. We used the Amazon Installation Service and it was extremely well done. Great product and great installation.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Paul

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected! Feels like a professional basketball hoop on the driveway. Don’t hesitate!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop. We love the adjustable feature!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves the hoop and we are looking forward to years of family pig games on it
customer_reviews.author: Lucas W.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sleek unit
customer_reviews.text: Basketball hoop came earlier than expected. Very nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Charles M. Heidenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great goal, small shake
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding goal. It does shake slightly more than expected, but it stabilizes fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Steady product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. We used to have a not in-ground hoop, but the hoop shakes when the ball hit it. The hoop is so steady that the hoop don't move at all.
customer_reviews.author: Hui-Hsin Hsiung

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for your health
customer_reviews.text: High quality hoop, we are playing every day since it was installed.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but tight rim
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. I have three boys that love it and play hard on it. The only drawback I have so far is that the rim is very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't go with the 2 poles unit,, go with the one solid pole unit.
customer_reviews.text: The new 2 pole Gorilla is the worst one they ever made, it shakes just like a goaliath unit. I'm a professional installer for 17yrs and changing the design to 2 poles is there biggest mistake. Now the one solid pole is awesome is more sturdy and solid unit. If you looking to get a unit and spend as much money, go with the one solid pole 4" thickness or better on the pole itself is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Pizarro

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Refused to Replace Backboard Delivered Defective
customer_reviews.text: The pole was installed and anchored in concrete. When the backboard was opened it was discovered to have a crack. I contact Amazon who has thus far refused to replace the backboard.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Skinner

customer_reviews.title: I love how it looks.
customer_reviews.text: Hi Goalrilla I am a famous youtuber and would like to have your goal in my videos.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Rowland

product_meta.title: Goalrilla FT Series Basketball Hoop with Tempered Glass Backboard, Black Anodized Frame, and In-ground Anchor System
feature_bullets: PRO-STYLE LOOK AND PERFORMANCE - Clear View tempered glass backboard delivers pro-style look and rebound performance
POWDER-COATED STEEL - Black anodized frame creates a professional, arena-style appearance
MOVE YOUR HOOP WITH YOU - In-ground anchor system cured in concrete with the option to unbolt and move goal
INNOVATIVE STEEL POLE DESIGN - Uncompromising strength and stability supported by Three-Point Technology
INCREASE STABILITY - Foundational strength of 1-piece main pole mounted to concrete anchor

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
